text: Milan Hurtala (16 June 1946 â€“ 20 March 2021) was a Slovak rower. He competed in the men's coxed eight event at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Bratislava. Hurtala died in Bratislava from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Slovakia on 20 March 2021, aged 74. == References == Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Rowers Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Olympians for Czechoslovakia
title: Milan Hurtala
